title: Digistyle Watch Face
summary: A typical numeric representation of time and date, with style and animations.
developerAddress:

3BIS rue Henri Barbusse
30000 Nîmes - France
description: Digistyle Watch Face, an uncluttered animated representation of time and date at your wrist, only for Wear.      Long press the watch face screen and touch the settings button at bottom to access all the settings/options.        • 60 FPS animation (can be reduced for saving more battery).• 24-hour or 12-hour notation with or without AM/PM.• Date display with several formats.• Default, custom or random foreground and background colors.• Fixed rotation from -90° to +90° allowed.• Clock and background oscillation (disabled by default).• Random and cycling color mode (disabled by default).• Glitch effects (can be disabled), even available in ambient mode or when tapping the screen.• Ambient entry animation (disabled by default).• White-on-black, black-on-white  or colored ambient mode.• All digits or only those changing can be animated.• Date, seconds and colons optionally displayable.• Minimal battery level.• Round and square screens supported.• Battery efficient.• Little footprint, size is 226KB.• And many more... descriptionHTML:
Digistyle Watch Face, an uncluttered animated representation of time and date at your wrist, only for Wear.

Long press the watch face screen and touch the settings button at bottom to access all the settings/options.

• 60 FPS animation (can be reduced for saving more battery).
• 24-hour or 12-hour notation with or without AM/PM.
• Date display with several formats.
• Default, custom or random foreground and background colors.
• Fixed rotation from -90° to +90° allowed.
• Clock and background oscillation (disabled by default).
• Random and cycling color mode (disabled by default).
• Glitch effects (can be disabled), even available in ambient mode or when tapping the screen.
• Ambient entry animation (disabled by default).
• White-on-black, black-on-white or colored ambient mode.
• All digits or only those changing can be animated.
• Date, seconds and colons optionally displayable.
• Minimal battery level.
• Round and square screens supported.
• Battery efficient.
• Little footprint, size is 226KB.
• And many more...

TROUBLESHOOTING
Wait 10 to 20 seconds after install in order to be able to select it.
If it is still not available, "Resync apps" or uninstall and then re-install it again, and be sure to have enough free space.
comments: Beautiful watch face, broken date display This watchface looks great and performs fantastically. Battery usage is light and there are a ton of customization options. However the date doesn't update until I turn it off and then back on in the options menu every day. 3 stars until fixed.

Just what i wanted This app is all i ever wanted. I really am surprised that there are not more like it around. I am able to customize everything just right and the digital glitch animations look really cool.
I have no idea what some of these system UI settings are. Status bar gravity? Protect hotword? Card progress mode? Are these documented someplace?
Thanks for this Well worth the money, been looking for this for ages... looks amazing in black. Thanks again you nailed it :)
Awesome Love the animation. Any chance of a less manic battery indicator?
Very awesome and simple with lots of customization!
recentChanges: Added features based on user request (black-on-white ambient display, minimal battery level, disabling AM/PM indicator, plain background color, etc...).
Added tap event to force the glitch and/or randomize colors.
